issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Second AM fails to recover properly when first AM is killed with java.lang.IllegalArgumentException causing lost job

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: The NM RPC port used to be part of the hostname field in JobHistory. That seems to have gone missing. Required for the task log link on the history server.
fields.summary: NM port info no longer available in JobHistory

comments.body:
Adds a port field to MapAttemptFinishedEvent, ReduceAttemptFinshedEvent and TaskAttemptUnsuccessfulCompletionEvent.
Also, fixes TestJobHistoryParsing - which has been failing silently.
The Rumen changes are not tested.
Added some fixes for the ant build (JobInProgress, Rumen, tests)

-1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12504982/MR3450_v2.txt
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    +1 tests included.  The patch appears to include 12 new or modified tests.

    +1 javadoc.  The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

    +1 javac.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    -1 findbugs.  The patch appears to introduce 12 new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

    +1 release audit.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    +1 core tests.  The patch passed unit tests in .

    +1 contrib tests.  The patch passed contrib unit tests.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/1341//testReport/
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/1341//artifact/trunk/hadoop-mapreduce-project/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshadoop-mapreduce-examples.html
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/1341//console
